synopsis.text: This captivating anime, set in the futuristic era of 2100 A.D., introduces a revolutionary age of super high-speed railways. The World Railway Conference unveils the Laser Rail, a groundbreaking mode of transportation that transcends terrestrial boundaries. To navigate this innovative rail system, the Train Base is established, housing an array of trains from around the globe equipped with advanced artificial intelligences and robotic bodies. This marks the inception of the Train Heroes, who undergo rigorous training within the Train Base. When catastrophes strike, these heroes rise to the occasion, transforming themselves to provide crucial disaster rescue and relief services. Notably, this anime is a collaborative effort between TV Tokyo and Carloon Animation Company, hailing from Chanzhou, China. Prepare for a thrilling ride as you embark on this unique journey of heroism and technological marvels.
